name: hue Match
description:
Memory game in combination with Philips hue lamps. Match resembling colors to solve the game. Looks very easy but is not! The hue Match app controls 1 to 3 lamps connected to your hue system. Different levels available reaching from clearly different colors to very pale and resembling colors.
Fun to do alone or in groups.

Preferable use app in combination with a single Philips hue system equipped with three lamps.
Note: when two or more hue systems are connected to the same network, hue Match will connect with the hue bridge having the lowest IP-address
